wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Christopher Charles Brown  is a retired British Army officer who was the last General Officer Commanding Northern Ireland.

response: *Senior British Military Representative and Deputy Commanding General, Multinational Force, Iraq: Lieutenant-General Chris Brown (March 2009 to April 2009)
